author: Minifig290
title: Hamleys Got A Figure. But why though?
review:
Now this is a weird store promo and why does hamley’s have a figure?

Any way this figure retails for £6 and is only at Hamley’s stores in England, Scotland and Wales. It has 5 parts so the price per part is very high at £1.20.

Minifigure

4 of the pieces make up the figure. His hat part is the same as the series 5 royal guard figure from 2012   in a black color with no print. His face looks focused and his torso print is similar to the series 5 figure as it has a white belt but has additional print for some medals.

Build

The other part is a black minifigure stand which has no print on it unfortunately.

______________________________

Overall

To finish off, i like this figure but it raises a question for me and that is why is this a thing it’s weird and random also Hamley’s isn’t as big as people think in the UK it has very few stores nationwide.

Apart from that i would recommend this figure to anyone when they are cheaper but £6 is a bit pricey for me.

Pros- Great printing throughout, Reuse of Series 5 hat part

Cons- Overpriced, Exclusivity, Horrid Price Per Part
